name: Henyk Survival
description:
Due to too many interruptions i had to scrap all together like this. Hope you enjoy.
Recommended setup would be keyboard + mouse ( only to UI ).
I think any PC configuration can run this game.

I did all the coding, and asked my friend who goes by the nickname "hooskii" to make a map for it.

All the external resources used in this project:

https://github.com/h8man/NavMeshPlus

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1...

https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-hero

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-skeleton

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-male-sheets

https://www.newgrounds.com/art/view/blankcanvasstudios/arrow-pixel-art

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/sparkles_616493

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/running-stick-figure_1837

https://thenounproject.com/icon/stun-3368557/

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/sword/
